plentry.pd: 0: Automatic scenario match, where the SDK chooses the appropriate audio quality according to the user role and audio route.
3: The high-quality audio scenario, where users mainly play music.
5: The chatroom scenario where users need to frequently switch the user role or mute and unmute the microphone.
6: (Default) The high-quality audio scenario, where users mainly play music.

7: The real-time chorus scenario, where users have good network conditions and require ultra-low latency.Before using this enumeration, you need to call to get whether the audio device supports ultra-low-latency capture and playback. 只有在支持极低延时（isLowLatencyAudioSupported = ）的音频设备上，才能够体验到极低延时。
The number of elements in the enumeration.
